comments.html: I admire your posts, read them every chance I get.  That said, this posting looks like a thinly veiled name calling exercise as vengeance for earlier comments.
comments.name: Anonymous

comments.html:
Actually, that's exactly what I tried to avoid. I wanted to point out the dangers of using vague terms like "switching" that can mean anything and tried to use the comment only to illustrate my point.

As for the "I fail to be impressed" part, sometimes I encounter a belief that FC is so much better (more stable etc) than IP, but if you compare them properly, there's not that much difference.
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak

comments.html: Great post, as usual. After studying so much FCoE this week at Cisco Live (and trying to learn FC along the way) this writeup helps reinforce and add to some of the basics I've learned.
comments.name: Swackhap
